title: Presentation of V-Lab
segmentation: Mention these to present to you the lab.
I am the general manager of Villa but I am also professor at University of Bordeaux and I work also in and you stay with a company called.
GFI balked.
The company I have created in.
10 years ago.
So what is Ivy Lab interval AB interval AB was created in March 2007 from the network of Excellence Interop?
No way was network launching the frame of FP 6.
Christina said some words on.
Interval Ibiza nonprofit International Association.
And there's a Belgium law because when you want to create something in Europe, you have to use this type of structure and we have a very original structure with a bottom up approach.
We have Paul we call regional pole.
And we don't.
It's more based on the geography, but what I learned today and I am very glad that is right.
For example, the University of Bucharest will join the Polygon Sudwest.
So in France because we we take in account also the culture we take into account the language.

Today we have exactly 76 partner like our Secretary general, always in the back of the room mentioned yesterday and we are around free Android researcher and I want to mention another originality of our project of our network.
We have one Chinese pole and we have also the great pleasure because he's very Fidel and always participate.
We have Professor Xu Selfie with the.
Chairman of the Chinese Bowl and I must indicate to you in the Chinese bowl, we have 16 partner, but I think it is a next slide.
Anne.
At.
I don't want to come back to the definition of enterprise interoperability.
What I want to put.
Evidence is a kind of philosophy we develop because we believe as strongly as the Christina Mansion.
We start this work at European level in 2000 by a small group with the stakeholder.
I remember we have people from air base from Fiat from mercy disbands.
The complaint on the cost of the non interoperability of application and we form a group and from this group to the effectively you have seen the result is.
Every big cluster with the 600 registered more more, seven, almost 700 and based on these work we have developed a philosophy.
Because interoperability is not new, but the philosophy is never, which solves the problem.
If only we look on the city.
And really what we have to develop it.
And I think we have still to work on that is to integrate the city with the enterprise modeling because we are working for an enterprise.
But how to connect effectively?
The ICT approach modeling ICT for example with enterprise modeling.

Strongly, I believe that model the enterprise is not the same thing that the models ICT, but we must be coherent and also more and more we have also to look on the semantic because effectively when you put together company even inside the same company you don't use always the same world to design the same things.
So really I think the philosophy behind our work is his integration between these three.
Domain.
And the mission of interval AB.
It was a mission given when we have the noise we have to Europe is fragmented organization because we is easy stories passed.
If you look the number of researcher in enterprise interoperability in the Good Research Center is between 10 and 15 is very small.
So really our role is to differ month and I have indicated.
To use a number today we around the free Android and we have to support the development not only of the research but also their education and innovation.
And we want to be an excellent center and we are very glad to see China participating in the villab.
But we have today other region of the world who want to join as a Villa because at the last I city in Lyon we have the visit of India.
We have the digital.
Russia of Brazil.
So there are strong interests effectively to join our community.
So I have said we are.
We have a very decentralized organization.
The more the engine of villab must be the pole and there is a lot of work we have.
If we start we have the Spanish pool with more located in Valencia.
But we have also the original or the Basque region with member.
We have the Portuguese pole with a very interesting organization within Lisbon, but is North.
University of Minot and also in the South with our garden.
We have the pool.
Consider West with effectively going from the North of France to to the South, and particularly we we have a strong connection with the.

You know, in France we have an organization called Pulled the competitivity and in Southwest of France we have one of the most important part of competitivity with Bio Space Valley between Bordeaux and Toulouse with the the Particia strong participation of fairbreeze there so.
So effectively and we have two day project with these.
This product of competitivity we have the UK pool.
We have the president of the UK pool with our Secretary General Keith proposal with more focus on SMS and it is very interesting to see this network of SM ES we have.
We have what we call the North Pole with a it is a Sweden, Norway and Finland.
Today's Bergen with coordinator, but certainly we will change with nine personnel we have as a German pole with located with the coordinator in Berlin and we have several funnel for Institute.

We have effectively is Italian porn or so, and you have seen yesterday with Michaela music off the coordinator, and we have the Chinese port and the Chinese Paul's 16 partner today and the two last Member Rs Me online I think is several million of SMS connected with this organization and the Institute of Standardization for new technology, and this is very interesting.
I discussed already with Mr County.
From a DGU is very as the Commission is very interested to see this connection with this very important Institute in in China.
So I have said we are decentralized the.
The pool, I repeat the pool, is really the engine of the system.
We have the partner.
They are organized as they want.
We check only one things.
If the objective of the pool is not in contradiction with the objective of the Villa, if there if it is compatible, they can create.
So the pool of partner and at the Villa level we have a very small structure for 300 people.
We are to coordinate one.
.2 person so I don't think we we spend too much money in in the coordination.
We work effectively in.
Support all by activities.
Will be compacted there.
We have education and research institution.
We have private organization technology and service IIT provider.
We have some end user who are coming today because very interesting action is when we have some result at European level like the result of interop Athena.
Today we create local project for example if I take the example of France we have today two projects one in.
Aircraft industries as a Gandhi in in remote selling.
If you want when you sell on the web in the North of France and South of France and we try to disseminate to promote the result at the European level and we have also public organization.
Major it is some region, for example are now member or some organization of SM ES official organization of SMS.
So the scientific activity allow you know we were created only in 2007.
So is 2 years activities and how we are surviving by the fee paid by the Member we we.
We have no official support, so we work by ourself by also the contract we are able also to get locali.
This is very interesting.
And we have a deciding following the cluster on which we will participate actively.
The Task force number one is to work on the scientific framework.
Just I mentioned that the framework shown by Sergio with this framework developed by Interop today is that standardization level and I though is certainly promoting this disease framework.
You have seen with the free.
Axis and, but we want to continue to work.
Why?
Because we identify 5 framework today in only in Europe?
Perhaps there is a framework outside?
Perhaps we cannot unify.
I am not.
Somebody want to unify everything, but just we have to understand why we have several framework and power by understanding why, perhaps we can effectively decrease this number.
We have also some very interesting result coming from.
Athena and interop.
Was the MDI SLR model driven interoperability who come from the MDA and we have developed.
I am sure very original concept but today we have to validate on the floor and we have.
Effectively I have mentioned in Francis 2 project who are working strongly to implement the MDI.
We are very interesting today.
A workshop what we have we have to record what we have done and we have to increase.
So in the future we expect to develop the number of reference application, enterprise, interoperability, practice practice.
So these attacks forced #3, that's for number 4.
Is a road map.
Effectively, we have worked on the rock market initially.
Commission is is following and what we want to do is not to make to to to duplicate the work, just to prepare and to bring some reserve who can facilitate the elaboration of the road map.
Is exactly the same for Sciencebase definition, because our whole also is not only to contribute and for example, during the last activity of the cluster we have tried to mobilize our member.
You know it's not very easy to to involve the people we have a lot of Mail to say.
Hey, you have to answer.
We have sent to you and so on and so on.
So this is the work we are doing.
And we ever contributed, for example, to the position paper, and we hope to to continue.
So our role is to contribute.
And it's exactly the same for the science based definition.
And the last is ontology because we have we have identified at the last General Assembly we have in June in Brussels.
Alot of activity concerning the use of ontology in the domain of enterprise interoperability.
For example, there is a very precise problems today.
How we use?
In the Federated approach, and I am very interested to see what you are doing in in the project #5, how we use ontology in order to allow the vertical and horizontal transformation in the MDI.
And this is not today completely clear.
We have a good concept but we have to go further and it is role of effective level up we have.
Also, our education is standardization activity in education we disseminate to maintain a European master.
We have defined European master.
It is a reference.
As you know, the master is difficult to to to a tab Lish because it depends on the Organism, the local organizations, Ministry of Education.
If I take the France plus the administration of University, but we give a reference and you can find effectively this reference.
And also more and more we want to develop a vocational program because like it was said, the dissemination industry is very important.

For example one project we have in France, we associate specialist in the domain of vocational courses and we want that this project deliver courses for industry and we plan to transfer over to the lab in order we disseminate in in the other country.
We have also the standardization activity we have.
We have very interesting group and our role in the standardization activities to influence standards.
Exactly what we are doing with the framework.
We want to increase the visibility and awareness of such a standard because it exists a lot of standard, but sometimes people have difficulty to to understand to see what they have to use.
And also we want to contribute effectively to stand our bodies or project because we have several member.
What part on these?
And also in their RV lab, provide the services.
We have a collaborative platform with complete restructuration in this time.
So if you go don't be worry.

We need one month more because we upgrade the version it is based on plan and on this platform we have what we call the knowledge map and certainly with the new structure of the platform we think the knowledge mark we will be more powerful and very soon we will indicate to you what we can do.
We have also the learning service.
We have to improve this platform also and also we try to support our member in in research project.
For example, in this time we disseminate and we explain to our Member the call 5 of the European Commission because we think our Member could be very interested.
So we disseminate more the information.
OK, I will not go in detail on that.
And just I want to finish.
Because to be on time.

So our headquarter is in in browsers at the Bureau Dicky Turner up we are strongly supported by the consideration Alofa Kitten, and we have the chance to have the President of the region is the president of all the region in France and is very interested by what we have done.
And we have the operational office at University Board.
One who supporters strongly because the upgrade of the platform was based on the support we received from.
Do University thank you very much for your attention and.
